ai-patthana22.34:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.34:0.3_0: He is the defilement of his defilements, overcoming what is given in the formless,
ai-patthana22.34:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the defilements that give rise to defilements but doesn’t give rise to the defilements. ...
ai-patthana22.34:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
